Inc.","details":"Implements the \"mint-at-funding\" model:      - Commitments are created at subscription (no tokens minted)      - Tokens are minted only when capital is actually funded      - This ensures 3(c)(1) compliance: only funded investors are beneficial owners      Works with CapitalCallFacet:      - CapitalCallFacet references commitments for pro-rata calculations      - CapitalCallFacet calls recordCapitalFunded() to mint tokens","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function params.membershipToken: Token that will be minted upon funding

acceptCommitment(bytes32).details: Only admin can accept. Investor becomes an LP with unfunded commitment.

adjustCommitment(bytes32,uint256,string).details: Only admin can adjust. Common for side letters or amendments.

cancelCommitment(bytes32,string).details: Only admin can cancel. Cannot cancel if capital has been funded.

createCommitment(address,uint256).details: Called when investor subscribes to the fund

markDefaulted(bytes32).details: Called when member fails to meet capital call obligation

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

recordCapitalCalled(address,uint256).details: Called by CapitalCallFacet when a capital call is created

recordCapitalFunded(address,uint256).details: Called by CapitalCallFacet when contribution is received

acceptCommitment(bytes32).notice: Accept a pending commitment (GP admits the investor)

cancelCommitment(bytes32,string).notice: Cancel a commitment before any funding

getCommitmentId(address).notice: Get commitment ID for a member

getMemberOwnershipBps(address).notice: Get member's ownership percentage based on tokens minted

hasActiveCommitment(address).notice: Check if member has an active commitment

isCommitmentInitialized().notice: Check if commitment facet is initialized

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

recordCapitalCalled(address,uint256).notice: Record capital being called from a commitment

recordCapitalFunded(address,uint256).notice: Record capital being funded and mint tokens
